channel.title: Old internet, they imply... Yet, that's a huge flat screen there
channel.description:
http://imgur.com/S9DebvH
I really wish this is simply yet another day in that kid's awesome life and this video was made by a pleased gramma who just learned to internet!
(brought to you [by oipocorp](https://twitter.com/oipocorp/status/685990900397436928))
